---

**As a** <some role>
**I need** <some function>
**So that** <I get some benefit>

 ### Assumptions
- List any assumptions about how to implement the Story

### Acceptance Criteria
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
